2124.subject: MIT
2124.descrlong: Provides both the strategic and technical essentials of designing, developing, and managing an e-Commerce initiative. The course starts with a survey of the landscape of e-Commerce technologies and how businesses employ them to gain competitive advantages. Students then gain hands-on experience using hardware and system software, and learn various technology and design issues by building a fully functional prototype of an e-Commerce site.
